source:
TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_00Beaudefoin will be your guide on the path to becoming an Eorzean Nimble Warrior.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_00※ Dieser Auftrag ist nur für die Dauer des saisonalen Ereignisses verfügbar.

Beaudefoin erwartet mutige Abenteurer zur Teilnahme am Feuermond-Parkour.

source:
TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_01Beaudefoin explains the simple rules of the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. Each of the three sections is marshaled by a Moonfire Faire chaperone, to whom you must speak before proceeding any further. J'nangho is the first chaperone and can only be reached by a series of carefully measured leaps.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_01※ Dieser Auftrag kann nur für die Dauer des saisonalen Ereignisses angenommen und gespielt werden. Nach Ende des saisonalen Ereignisses kann er nicht mehr abgeschlossen werden. Weitere Informationen findest du auf dem Lodestone.

Beaudefoin gibt den Startschuss zum Feuermond-Parkour. Überquere das erste Holzgerüst und sprich mit J'nangho.

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_02<tab>Upon witnessing your completion of the first test, J'nangho is pleased but not surprised by your success. She warns you that greater challenges must be overcome to arrive at Hildelana's platform at the end of the second section.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_02<tab>J'nangho empfängt dich am ersten Zwischenziel. Überquere das zweite Gerüst und sprich dort mit Hildelana.

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_03<tab>As you step onto the next stage of the course, the steep increase in difficulty is apparent from the outset. Each jump and balancing act is more perilous than the last, and you breathe a sigh of relief when you finally reach Hildelana. While she is clearly delighted that you have made it this far, she is nonetheless quick to impress on you that the worst is still to come...
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_03<tab>Du erreichst Hildelana am zweiten Zwischenziel. Erklimme nun den Hauptturm und melde dich am Ziel bei P'obyano.

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_04<tab>Faced with the imposing final section of the course, you step forward with trepidation. Knowing that every leap could end in dismal failure, you feel as though your heart is in your throat as you slowly ascend the tower. At long last, the goal is in sight, and with one final jump, your triumph is secured. P'obyano the chaperone welcomes you with a beaming smile, and elated cheers can be heard from the spectators watching from Costa del Sol. There can be no doubt in the minds of the awed onlookers that the Adventurers' Guild boasts the most courageous, nimblest warriors Eorzea has ever seen.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_SEQ_04<tab>Du erreichst P'obyano und hast damit den Feuermond-Parkour erfolgreich abgeschlossen. Wenn du möchtest, kannst du jederzeit einen neuen Durchgang wagen, solange der Feuermond-Reigen läuft.

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_TODO_00<tab>Complete the first section of the course and speak with J'nangho.
TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_TODO_01<tab>Complete the second section of the course and speak with Hildelana.
TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_TODO_02<tab>Complete the final section of the course and speak with P'obyano.
TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_000<tab>So, are you ready to face the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course, to risk it all for a chance at glory? If so, you've come to the right place!

TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_001<tab>Before you begin, allow me to explain the rules. The course is divided into three parts, which you have to complete in order. There is but one objective: to reach the chaperones standing on the platforms.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_001<tab>Die Regeln sind ganz einfach. Du musst zuerst die beiden Gerüste überqueren und zum Schluss den Hauptturm hochklettern. Dabei gibt es keine Zeitbegrenzung und es ist auch egal, wie oft du herunterfällst.

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_002<tab>You can take as long as you need, and if you fall off, just go back to the beginning of that section to try again. The first chaperone you need to reach is J'nangho, who'll tell you where to go next. Now, step into the jet of water and make us proud!
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_002<tab>J'nangho erwartet dich am ersten Zwischenziel auf dem Gerüst. Also zeig mal, wie gut du springen kannst!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_010<tab>Back for more? There are even more onlookers to impress than last time, so show them what you've got!
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_010<tab>Na, willst du noch einmal am Feuermond-Parkour teilnehmen? Das nenn ich Eifer!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_011<tab>Remember─just because you've beaten the course before, don't underestimate it.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_011<tab>Die Regeln kennst du ja schon, aber zur Sicherheit erklär ich sie noch einmal. Du musst zwei Zwischenziele erreichen und zum Schluss den Hauptturm erklimmen. Dabei gibt es keine Zeitbegrenzung und es ist egal, wie oft du herunterfällst.

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_012<tab>If you show a moment's hesitation or misstep by even half an ilm, you'll be in the drink before you know it. Or in the sand. Either way, very embarrassing. Anyway, J'nangho is waiting for you on her platform. Don't keep the spectators waiting─off you go!
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_012<tab>J'nangho erwartet dich am ersten Zwischenziel auf dem Gerüst direkt vor uns. Mal sehen, wie schnell du diesmal bei ihr bist!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_013<tab>This may be the easiest of the three sections, but don't get careless.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_013<tab>J'nangho erwartet dich auf dem Gerüst vor uns. Mal sehen, wie gut du springen kannst!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_BEAUDEFOIN_000_014<tab>That was very impressive and all, but you're going the wrong way!
TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_JNANGHO_000_020<tab>Oh! Well done! But don't pat yourself on the back yet. There's still a long way to go!
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_JNANGHO_000_020<tab>Du hast es geschafft! Und es hat echt Spaß gemacht, dir zuzusehen. So gut würde ich auch gerne springen können.

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_JNANGHO_000_021<tab>Once you've caught your breath, make your way towards Hildelana at the end of the second section. Best of luck!
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_JNANGHO_000_021<tab>Atme kurz durch, und dann geht es für dich weiter zum zweiten Zwischenziel auf dem nächsten Gerüst. Dort wartet Hildelana auf dich. Viel Glück!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_JNANGHO_000_022<tab>Do you need a rest? Enjoying the view, perhaps? There's no need to rush I suppose, but the spectators might think you're being lazy. And we wouldn't want that, would we?
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_JNANGHO_000_022<tab>Du musst rüber zum nächsten Gerüst. Dort wartet Hildelana auf dich. Viel Glück!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_HILDELANA_000_030<tab>Such poise, such grace! A fine demonstration of what members of the guild are capable of.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_HILDELANA_000_030<tab>Gut gemacht! War das etwa zu leicht für dich? Keine Sorge, am Hauptturm wird dir alles abverlangt!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_HILDELANA_000_031<tab>However, I must save my most heartfelt congratulations for when you have conquered the third and final stage. Luckily for me, I will have the perfect view of your ascent to the top. Good luck!
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_HILDELANA_000_031<tab>Aber du schaffst das schon. Wenn du P'obyano auf dem Turm erreichst, bist du am Ziel. Viel Glück!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_HILDELANA_000_032<tab>It may seem rather daunting, and for good reason, but it is by no means impossible. Be sure to maintain focus and above all, don't look down!
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_HILDELANA_000_032<tab>Um den Feuermond-Parkour abzuschließen, musst du P'obyano auf dem Hauptturm erreichen. Viel Glück!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_040<tab>You did it! I knew you would! Right from the start, I had a good feeling about you. I couldn't help but follow your progress every step of the way.
TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_041<tab>And it seems I wasn't the only one. Your young friends jumped for joy when you reached the top.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_041<tab>Ich bin mir sicher, viele Neulinge werden dir nacheifern und der Aben<var 16 /var>teurer<var 16 /var>gilde die Bude einrennen!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_050<tab>That reminds me─you'd better go and let Haermaga know that you finished the course. He struggles to watch the competitors <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> handle all of the registrations, so we ask all successful entrants to report to him afterwards. It helps us keep track of things.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_050<tab>Vergiss nicht, Haermaga von deinem Erfolg zu berichten.

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_051<tab>You don't have to hurry, though. I think you've earned a respite after all of your exploits. And watch your footing on the way down. We can't have you breaking your legs in front of everybody! That would certainly take the shine off of your achievement.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_051<tab>Er freut sich sicher, dass du es geschafft hast. Also dann, mach's gut!

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_060<tab>In fact, I would say they cheered even louder than before. You've become quite a favorite with the crowds.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_060<tab>Falls du den Feuermond-Parkour wiederholen möchtest, dann melde dich einfach bei Beaudefoin am Startpunkt.

source: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_061<tab>You can try the course as many times as you like, so if you'd like to start again, talk to Beaudefoin. That way, we'll be able to give you the proper rewards.
target: TEXT_FESSUM402_03136_POBYANO_000_061<tab>Die Zuschauer sind begeistert von deinen Sprüngen! Ich übrigens auch. Hoffentlich machst du noch ein paar Durchgänge!
